content: **stitch guide** * double_crochet = double_crochet * chain = chain **description from snuggles project website** > i use the thick yarn that comes in 8 oz skeins with a h hook and it works up into a nice thick comfy mat the same when i use regular worsted weight and a g hook there is no need to go out and get expensive fuzzy yarn this stitch is thick and comfy and works up fast **snuggles project mission statement** > the snuggles project was founded by our president rae french in 1996 > the security blankets are called > snuggles > > most shelter animals are kept in areas with stainless steel braces > and hard plastic flooring or even bare > concrete floors the snuggles would > allow them to have a little reprieve > from the coldness of the pen they are > kept in > > while you are knitting crocheting or sewing your snuggles > please respect the originality and the > future of the project and give credit > where credit is due **keep the snuggles project alive** whenever you give your finished snuggles to a shelter let everyone know you re a part of the snuggles project effort fill out a donation report form 1 to help count all the snuggles that are helping homeless animals 1 https //snugglesproject org/pattern-library/snuggles-reporting html
